localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: https://100project.co is the world’s first crowdsourced NFT, a truly collective work of art. Once all pieces are filled, the final artwork will be minted as an NFT, with profits going to the owners of each piece if sold—so buying a piece is also an investment.
blogPost.body: https://100project.co is the world’s first crowdsourced NFT, a truly collective work of art. Once all pieces are filled, the final artwork will be minted as an NFT, with profits going to the owners of each piece if sold—so buying a piece is also an investment.
blogPost.title: 100 Project - The world's first crowdsourced NFT
blogPost.author: Traf

localize.description: https://100project.co 是世界上第一个众包的NFT，是一个真正的集体艺术品。一旦所有作品被填满，最终的艺术品将被铸成NFT，如果售出，利润将归每件作品的所有者所有--所以购买一件作品也是一种投资。
https://100project.co 是世界上第一個衆包的NFT，是一個真正的集體藝術品。一旦所有作品被填滿，最終的藝術品將被鑄成NFT，如果售出，利潤將歸每件作品的所有者所有--所以購買一件作品也是一種投資。

previous.excerpt: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
previous.title: Alertly.io - Your personalized slack bot for JIRA alerts

localize.description: Alertly是您个性化的Slack机器人，用于获取JIRA提醒。设置重要的提醒，这些提醒是可操作的和个性化的，以便正确的人得到通知，所有这些都来自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您个性化的JIRA警报懒惰机器人

localize.description: Alertly是您個性化的Slack機器人，用於獲取JIRA提醒。設置重要的提醒，這些提醒是可操作的和個性化的，以便正確的人得到通知，所有這些都來自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您個性化的JIRA警報懶惰機器人

next.excerpt: Can you make time where there is none? We're two designers at Clockwise who built a video game to help us design a better algorithm.
next.title: Defragged — A game about calendars - Brought to you by the Clockwise Design Team

localize.description: 你能在没有时间的地方创造时间吗？我们是Clockwise的两个设计师，他们建立了一个视频游戏来帮助我们设计一个更好的算法。
localize.tagline: 由顺时针设计团队为您带来。

localize.description: 你能在沒有時間的地方創造時間嗎？我們是Clockwise的兩個設計師，他們建立了一個視頻遊戲來幫助我們設計一個更好的算法。
localize.tagline: 由順時針設計團隊爲您帶來。
